Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra Pro Series Analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems CALCIUM ARSENAZO kit for quantitative determination of calcium in serum, plasma, and urine using Selectra Pro Series Analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of total calcium in human serum, plasma, and urine to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of parathyroid disease, bone diseases, chronic renal disease, and tetany; for use with Selectra Pro Series Analyzers; not intended for point-of-care settings
